content: Write a paragraph where every word starts with the letter 's'.

Sure, here's a paragraph where every word begins with the letter 'S':

"Silent stars shimmered splendidly, signaling serene seasons. Soft snowflakes silently sank, surrounding solitary saplings. Swift swans soared, seeking sheltered shores. Sophisticated scholars studied strange scriptures, seeking sacred secrets. Sunny skies spread soft shades, stirring sleeping souls. Satisfying success soon surfaced, sparking spontaneous smiles."
